name: The Shameful Harvest
description:
**Best played with a GamePad**

A short platformer game made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 52!

Quasar, a famed Space Archaeologist has landed on a mysterious planet to investigate

an old tomb. On the planet are strange plants that create fruit based on emotions and moods of the actions taken by those nearby.

Quasar is actually a fool, taking the credit for what was really mostly done by his droid for most of his career.  On this raid, however, he will be unable to run away from or hide the burdens of his guilt and shame, quite literally.
